attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At least 250,000 patients are admitted to hospital every single year suffering from Adverse Drug Reactions. The BMA puts the yearly cost of treating ADR's at around 466 million pounds! 

People (inc. doctors & scientists) are beginning to take notice & realise that vivsection is all about making money & nothing to do with ethics or science of any kind!

Vivisection is fraud, it's costing many human & non-human lives/casualties & it has to end NOW!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Recognise that vivisection is fraud!"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14425.asp

Prime Minister's Office
